item.title: How I created this blog, with Hugo
item.description: In this post, I will just give a quick overview and hints of how I created the website with Hugo, I will not go into all the details. My main inspiration and what I was aiming for this blog was John L. Godlee blog . A very well done blog in my opinion and I can only recommand you to take a look at his blog. For this blog, I actually wanted to understand how hugo worked, so I started from scratch with hugo basic theme and used the book “Brian P.
